transArray.content: The room is not big but well-equipped with everything you need. I stayed here for several days. The newly renovated self-service laundry room on the first floor is really convenient. There is also a clothes ironing machine next to it. There is a free unlimited supply of Coke and Sprite mineral water. It can be said that it is a great place to stay. They are very attentive. There are plenty of shared parking spaces in the car park. If you go out and ask for a coupon at the front desk, you can get it for free. It is very clean and the bed is very comfortable!

Simple, clear, and powerful! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving such a comprehensive review and recognition. Your support is the driving force for our continuous progress. All hotel staff will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay environment. Use our attentiveness to exchange for your comfort when you check in. We look forward to your every visit and wish you a healthy and happy life! General Manager: Li Changxia
